3. Ethics: After you obtain ethical and privacy approval from PRET please submit an updated DMP with the approval number as intermediate DMP, also update storage, preservation and sharing if changes are requested by the PRET team. 
7. Sharing: what is the reason to only share aggregated anonymized data with a sharing agreement, if there are factors restricting sharing please describe these under the first sub-question, otherwise you can consider to use RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you can  share anonymized data openly or set access restrictions if there are re-identification risks.
